quote: Be as simple as you can be; you will be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life can become. – Paramahansa Yogananda
fact: During a severe windstorm or rainstorm the Empire State Building sways several feet to either side.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What did the ocean say to the beach? Thanks for all the sediment.
